definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: These refer to the gear ratio in the differential.
sentences.chinese: 在差速器中，这些都是指减速比。

sentences.english: The differential's task is to distribute the drive forces variably between the front and rear axle .
sentences.chinese: 差速器的任务是在前后轴之间分配连续变化的驱动力。

sentences.english: The resulting effect is similar to that of a self-locking differential.
sentences.chinese: 由此产生的效果类似于一个自我的锁差速器。

sentences.english: They also correct the wheel base length back to standard by moving the diff forward.
sentences.chinese: 它们还通过差速器前移将轴距向前修正到标准位置。

sentences.english: When you put your foot on the loud pedal, power is sent to the diff.
sentences.chinese: 当你用脚踩油门时，动力首先被传到差速器。

sentences.english: The differential is widely used in automobile industry.
sentences.chinese: 差速器广泛应用于汽车行业。

sentences.english: This paper describes a planar construction by means of spreading the differential.
sentences.chinese: 把差速器展开，变原结构为平面。

sentences.english: A new type of potential barrier limited-slip differential is presented for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新型势垒式限滑差速器。

sentences.english: This paper is about the design of the transmission of transaxle CA20.
sentences.chinese: 本论文是关于CA20驱动桥的传动系统差速器设计。

sentences.english: Normally you have an engine or motor going through a differential.
sentences.chinese: 通常你有一个引擎或者电机来带动差速器。
